ygData.subject: Re: /Con Guide
ygData.msgSnippet: The /con guide really comes in handy. My friend has that guide book, and it helps out alot in finding good kills for good exp. While tarvelling around in the
ygData.messageBody:
The /con guide really comes in handy. My friend
has that guide book, and it helps out alot in finding
good kills for good exp. While tarvelling around in
the pit in the Field of Bone on Kunark, I looked back
on the /con guide to help pick out those better of
the blue scalebone skeletons. Still I'd rather take
the risk and fight white's or even yellow's. So far,
using the /con guide, I've filled 3 bubbles in around 2
hours, which I'd say isn't too shabby. I DID start a new
character and get him to level 9 in around a week.
<br><br>Speaking of griffs. I started a Dark Elf a while back and
wanted to start my levelling in Freeport, and on my way
blocking the trail was a griffon. I couldn't go around,
since there were higher level orc's scouting the place,
so I just thought, what the hell, and darted
through. I guess them griff's like me because it just kept
hovering in that same spot and never spotted me.
Unfortunately, the guy behind me wasn't as
lucky....<br><br>Xythe of the 9th Level<br>Iksar Shadow
Knight<br>Vazaelle
